name: Dice Drop Tower
description:
Fullscreen for the best experience!

Dice Drop Tower is an incremental pachinko game.

Drop dice down the tower to earn profits to buy more dice.

Controls:
-Space to drop die

Instructions:
-Start with 1 D4

-Drop it to earn profit

-Upgrades on die persist

-Buy more die by clicking the SHOP (top right)

-Get rich!
